```{r read in files}
library(tidyverse)
library(BoolNet)
network <- loadNetwork("sub_network.bn")
```

generate initial state where only il15, stimuli, and pdgfr are on
result should just be a random attractor
```{r random initial state}
yo <-getAttractors(network, type="synchronous", method = 'exhaustive')
print(yo)
getAttractorSequence(yo, 3)
```

```{r}
network2 <- loadNetwork("sub_network2.bn")
ya <-getAttractors(network2, type="synchronous", method = 'exhaustive')
print(ya)
```

```{r}
network <- loadNetwork("zanudo_boolean.bn")
p1<-fixGenes(network,c("il15", "stimuli"),c(1,1))
hey <- getAttractors(p1, type = 'synchronous', startStates = 100000)
names(hey)
print(hey)
length(hey)
length(hey$attractors)
```
